description:
What is Jisr: 

Cloud-Based Platform to manage your People, designed according to the local needs and compatible Saudi Labour Law. Jisr provides a different digital experience for your employees and Helps you Automate lots of Admin work so you can focus on your People.

How does Jisr work?

Flexible and single platform to manage All employees Data, Compliance with Saudi Labor Law, Automated payroll, Reports that Support Business Decisions, Financial Data integrated into your Accounting System. Effective performance management, custom reports, and more.

Why choose Jisr?
Join +3000 Saudi companies that trust Jisr. With +350,000 employees in +16 industries managed by the Jisr platform every workday.
description_metadata_raw: Discover Jisr, the next generation of all-in-one Human Capital Management solution designed for businesses in Saudi Arabia. From HRIS, payroll, spend, employee benefits to health insurance, manage all your people needs with Jisr.

company_updates.reshared_post_description:
Afrah Ahmed โ Driving Growth Through Meaningful Relationships & Human-Centered Sales

Afrah Ahmed is not just a sales and business development leaderโsheโs a believer in the power of human connection. With nearly a decade of experience in relationship management, business growth, and B2B sales across Saudi Arabia, Afrah blends empathy, persistence, and strategy to deliver impact beyond the numbers.

Her journey started in sales representation roles, but it was her ability to understand human needsโwhether in HR services or tech solutionsโthat quickly set her apart. At Vaal, Kawarizm Academy, and now Jisr | ุฌุณุฑ, Afrah has proven her strength in lead generation, cold calling, and sales process optimization. Since 2019, sheโs been with Jisr, rising from Sales Executive to SDR Manager, where she leads a team focused on relationship-first sales strategies that translate into real growth.

Afrahโs professional mission is clear: to approach every day with a sense of purpose and to use her energy not just to close deals, but to open doorsโfor people, for businesses, and for a more peaceful world. As she puts it, โMy energy for work goes beyond offices and keyboards.โ

With academic credentials in HR from University of Jeddah and King AbdulAziz University, she merges theoretical knowledge with real-world experience, making her a unique bridge between people-focused leadership and scalable business growth.

If you're looking for a growth strategist who leads with heart and delivers with consistency, Afrah is one to watch.
